introductionMD: This course is designed for absolute beginners who want to learn Spanish from scratch.
goalsMD: By the end of this course, you will be able to introduce yourself, hold basic conversations, and understand simple texts in Spanish.
requirementsMD: No prior knowledge of Spanish is required.

title: French Grammar Masterclass
subheading: Master French grammar rules and usage
introductionMD: In this course, you will delve deep into the intricacies of French grammar, from basic to advanced concepts.
goalsMD: By the end of this course, you will have a solid understanding of French grammar and be able to use it accurately in your speech and writing.
requirementsMD: Basic understanding of French vocabulary is recommended.

title: Mandarin Chinese for Travelers
subheading: Essential Mandarin phrases and expressions for travelers
introductionMD: Planning a trip to China? This course will teach you practical Mandarin phrases to help you navigate your way through the country.
goalsMD: By the end of this course, you will be able to greet people, ask for directions, order food, and handle common travel situations in Mandarin.
requirementsMD: No prior knowledge of Mandarin is required.

title: Advanced German Conversation
subheading: Enhance your German speaking skills through conversation practice
introductionMD: This course is designed for learners who already have a good grasp of German and want to focus on improving their conversational fluency.
goalsMD: By the end of this course, you will be able to engage in discussions on various topics, express opinions, and understand native speakers more easily.
requirementsMD: Intermediate level of German proficiency is recommended.
